result.name: building-regulations-research-programme-programme-management-system-pms
result.notes: PMS is an on-line project management tool / database that manages documents, contracts and outline financial information on Building Regulations research contracts and controls the access and exchange of information for DCLG contract managers and external contractors.

organization.name: department-for-communities-and-local-government
organization.title: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
organization.description:
The Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government's (formerly the Department for Communities and Local Government) job is to create great places to live and work, and to give more power to local people to shape what happens in their area.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-housing-communities-and-local-government

result.title: Building Regulations Research Programme Programme Management System (PMS)

extras.value: Much of this data is commercial in confidence; final reports for projects and details of successful bidders are published already.  This database is being  wound down in 2013/14
